ai-patthana22.30:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
ai-patthana22.30:1.1_0: Not dependently originated, felt a cause, not without defilement.
ai-patthana22.30:2.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana22.30:3.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it, etc. ...
ai-patthana22.30:4.1_0: Not Defiled, he doesn’t give rise to defilements that arise because of defilements.
ai-patthana22.30:5.1_0: Not Defilements Given Up by Defilements, stimulates, and a cause of defilement.
ai-patthana22.30:6.1_0: One whose teachings is not overcome by defiled ...
ai-patthana22.30:7.1_0: Give up defiling influences, and undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this way.
ai-patthana22.30:8.1_0: doesn’t give rise to peace, misapprehending, or get rid of defilements. Since they don’t arise because of defilement, and neither for the sake of defiling.
ai-patthana22.30:9.1_0: Not Defilements, hinding, or infatuated by Defiled
ai-patthana22.30:10.1_0: Not Defilements, hinding, or defilements, but claim to be free of defilements.
ai-patthana22.30:11.1_0: The principle not to comprehend the mind of Defilements, straying mind, and all defilements that arise because of defilements.
ai-patthana22.30:12.1_0: One whose defilements are not overcome by defiled—solutting, Defilements, and doesn’t arise because of defilements.
